bio1: I'm an SSR full-stack developer dedicated to delivering excellence in every aspect of my work.
bio2: Currently, I am working at AYI GROUP, where I primarily focus on frontend tasks. Recently, I have been involved in implementing a microfrontend architecture in legacy monolithic applications, coordinating with various teams, and building and deploying libraries, among other responsibilities. These types of tasks have allowed me to take on leadership roles.
bio3: I enjoy the opportunity to solve complex problems and to continuously learn, convinced that every challenge is an opportunity to grow and contribute innovative solutions.
